pullrequest.title: solve issue #1082 on pid limits handling

content.raw: I have some issues in re-targeting this PR (I am not an expert Mercurial user unfortunately), if you want I can open a new PR targeting gazebo_3.0 or we can simply use branch regression_test_1082 that I guess contains the test and the relative fix that was in this PR.
